text: Hi there, we have a few emails that use media queries (style tag is put inside a module and dropped onto the body) that aren't working for Gmail mobile clients. Is there a recommended solution to handle this type of situation? thanks.
Using the custom email templates. Dont use the drag drop email template

If you're using the Gmail app with a non-Gmail email address (like Yahoo, etc.), media queries are not supported. If you're using Gmail webmail in a mobile browser, it's not supported at all. Check out <https://www.caniemail.com/search/?s=%40media>
<@UKGV272KS> this is a fantastic resource! Pinning it now!
